scripts.load-tab: bash -c 'while ! nc -z geekofalltrades.local 8000; do sleep 0.5; done; open "http://geekofalltrades.local:8000"; while true; do fswatch -1 __styles __scripts *.php; done'
scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n SASS,TS,PHP,LOAD -c magenta,yellow,blue,green, "npm run sass-watch" "npm run ts-watch" "npm run php-server" "npm run load-tab"
scripts.deploy:stage:code: ssh goat "cd ~/dev.geekofalltrades.org && git pull origin main"
scripts.deploy:stage: npm run deploy:stage:code && npm run deploy:stage:photos
scripts.document: npm run document:sass && npm run document:ts && npm run document:php
